headline: World's top 100 defence groups boost arms sales by 4% in 2023, think tank SIPRI says
summary: The world's 100 biggest defence equipment makers increased their arms sales by 4.2% in 2023 to $632 billion, fuelled by wars and regional tensions, a leading think-tank said on Monday. ...

headline: Why RTX Stock Is A Buy In 2025 And I Keep Buying
summary: RTX Corporation shows strong EBITDA and free cash flow growth, with mid-single digit EBITDA growth. Read why I maintain my buy rating on RTX stock.
